divs: sighting detailsthere where reports of police in our town seeing an ufo up over a ridge near my home. my cousin and a few friends decided to take a ride and check it out. we pulled over near the end of the ridge and got out of the car.suddenly a ufo slowly and so quietly came over the ridge. i remember saying to my cousin how they aren't white but a dark brown \dark gray color. a row of square windows circled the object and from within was a bright light that encompassed the entire inside. i saw an alien standing in the window as clear as i see this monitor i am typing on. a strange thing is that after seeing the alien, my next memory is running into the car scared beyond words. the mystery is that this happened i believe in 1971 in east haven, connecticut and my friends and i never mentioned this experience until suddenly about 5 years ago, on the same day my cousin and i had a common thought as to why we never would talk about it. it was like when we thought of the event we couldn't hold on to the thought. i must of checked to see if time was lost and i believe no time was lost. this ufo flew very low and slow over homes and telephone poles. it came up from behind a small mountainous ridge and covered the length of at least three houses sitting on lots around 60' wide. i just had to tell someone this experience and i thank you.
